name: Slide Arena
description:
An independent arcade game where your only goal will be to survive the longest in an arena.

Slide and dodge various enemies from both sides of a chessboard to get the best score. Each dodged enemy gets a point. The more points you get, the more coins you get. The coins will allow you to buy new skins as well as new maps. Getting a high score will also allow you to unlock exclusive skins.

Get the highest score and win all the challenges to become the best player in Slide Arena!

Game Features:
• An arcade and action game with epic music.
• Simple controls.
• A progressive difficulty.
• Unlock and buy skins and maps to customize your game.
